short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances ChatGPT's editor by allowing users to adjust text area widths for better visibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat GPT Editor Expander is designed to enhance the text editing experience in text-based chat tools like ChatGPT. This extension allows users to adjust the width of text input fields in chat interfaces to their desired size, making it easier to view more content on wider screens. Users can set the width of text fields as a percentage, which enhances efficiency when using wide screens. It is an ideal tool for programmers, designers, and those who frequently work with chatbots
